trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! So, who are you s'posed to be? <var 09 E948 ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((I ain't never seen a dwarf like you before.)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) ((Some kind of traveler?)) /var> Well, at least you ain't a Tholl...
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_100_000<tab>...What do you want, and at this of all times?
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_200_000<tab>Lali-ho! Our beard oil's restocked at long last, so I s'pose I can spare a moment.
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_010<tab>Me? I'm a proud dwarf of the Goggs! The name's Gamgg, second daughter of Kagigg, daughter of Xolagg!

TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_011<tab>It's my job to oversee our supplies of beard oil, and give pointers to them what's having a hard time maintaining their whiskers. Aye, our beards are second only to our honor!
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_012<tab>Unlike them limp, wispy mops worn by the <var 1A 02 /var>Tholls<var 1A 01 /var>, our whiskers are bushy and shapely and shiny! And they smell good, too!
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_100_012<tab>I admit it isn't easy at the moment, what with all the smoke and ash and rubble, but a few explosions are no reason to relax our standards!
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_020<tab>This here is Komra! And you have the honor of standing amongst the sons and daughters of the mighty Gogg family!

TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_021<tab>You seem unfamiliar with our ways, so I'd best tell you straight: we don't take our beards off for no one what isn't family! Anyone as breaks that law is run out of the village!

TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_000_022<tab>As for trades, there ain't no one better than a Gogg at mining or smithing. We've got automata to help with the digging, aye, but we also built a few for battle. If them bastard Tholls come looking for trouble, then they'll bloody well find it!
TEXT_REGNOR4KOMRA_00608_GAMGG_100_022<tab>...In fact, has anyone tried chucking a few of those bastards down into the ruins? Our problems might sort themselves out.
